item.description:
It's another Halloween film!! Let's get together and watch another classic! If you're so inclined, you can stay for Frankenstein, but it won't be part of the official meetup!

  • Psycho @ 8pm
  • (Frankenstein @ 10pm; if you dare!)

Sell-out probability is high, so you should probably get your tickets online or go to the theatre earlier in the week. We'll meet out front at 7:40pm, assemble, and then get seats (hopefully in the balcony)!

Call me if you're running late (401-965-5488).
item.name: Psycho @ Somerville Theatre (October 29th)
